section.title: Detailed Register History
section.para: To view detailed Cash Register history, select the "Detailed Register History" option. The following screen will appear:

Detailed Register History
When reviewing detailed Cash Register history, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to display Cash Register history for all Sites.
Specify Site whose Cash Register history you want to display.
Select to display Cash Register history for all Terminals.
Specify Terminal whose Cash Register history you want to display.
Transactions conducted on and after this date will be displayed.
Transactions conducted on and before this date will be displayed.
Display lists detailed Cash Register transaction history, using the specified parameters.
